thread.title: 20-Year-Old Man Fatally Shot In Homewood Bar
thread.title_full: 20-Year-Old Man Fatally Shot In Homewood Bar

author: CBS Pittsburgh
title: 20-Year-Old Man Fatally Shot In Homewood Bar
text:
20-Year-Old Man Fatally Shot In Homewood Bar March 19, 2017 6:38 AM Photo Credit: Thinkstock 
HOMEWOOD (KDKA) — A man was fatally shot in a bar in Homewood early Sunday morning. 
The Allegheny County medical examiner’s office identified the victim was 20-year-old Sean Lyons, of Pittsburgh. 
The shooting happened around 4:30 a.m. on Kelly Street and Brushton Avenue. 
According to police, officers were sent to the scene for a report that someone had been shot inside a bar. 
Lyons was found at the scene, where he was pronounced dead. 
Police say no further details are available at this time, and the investigation is ongoing.
